question: Which plans to set up LPG bottling plant in Balangir, Odisha?
explanation: Bharat Petroleum Corporation Limited (BPCL) announced that an LPG bottling plant is being set up in Balkhani,Balangir district in Odisha. Bharat Petroleum Corporation Limited (BPCL) announced that an LPG bottling plant is being set up in Balkhani,Balangir district in Odisha, This project will costRs. 103 crore. The LPG will be built across 23 acres of land of Barkhani village, 12 kms from the Balagir railway station. This will produce 42 lakh cylinders per year and will be operational from March 2020.
